title: Creating a Common Denominator
text: We must find the LCD in order to add the fractions. The LCM of $$15a^2 b$$ and $$6{ab}^2$$ is $$30a^2 b^2$$

title: Rewriting Each Fraction
text: We can rewrite each fraction with a common scaler to get $$\frac{4b}{30a^2 b^2}+\frac{25a}{30a^2 b^2}$$

title: Adding the Fractions
text: Adding these two fractions, we get $$\frac{4b+5a}{30a^2 b^2}$$
